description: This file contains test cases for the 'Team' class in the 'agno' package, specifically testing collaborative team functionalities including basic operation and structured output with Pydantic models.

classes.name: DebateResult
classes.description: A Pydantic model used to structure the output of a debate between two perspectives.

methods.name: test_collaborate_team_basic
methods.description: Tests the basic functionality of a collaborative team, verifying response content, tools, and member responses.

methods.name: test_collaborate_team_with_structured_output
methods.description: Tests the collaborative team with a structured output model, ensuring all fields are populated correctly.
